attributes.action: Stop Brexit now to avoid destroying our nation.
attributes.additional_details: We were unprepared, we were lied to, and we have been made scapegoats for the government's own self serving desires. Brexit never was and never will be about the British people. It is illegal and must be stopped. If it continues, all our future lives are at risk.
attributes.background: Brexit was a mass of lies. We, the British public must be able to trust our government, but, we were lied to by both sides. The fact remains that it was illegal due to varying factors (funding, lies) It should never have happened.
